mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rpl(rplno, contentsbdno, mno, content, passwd, rdate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(rplno), 0) + 1 as rplno FROM rpl), #{contentsbdno}, #{mno}, #{content}, #{passwd}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT rplno, contentsbdno, mno, content, passwd, rdate FROM rpl ORDER BY rplno DESC
SELECT rplno, contentsbdno, mno, content, passwd, rdate FROM rpl WHERE contentsbdno=#{contentsbdno} ORDER BY rplno DESC
